projects.name: Codebase Analysis & Cleanup

tasks.title: Complete File Redundancy Scan
tasks.description: Scan all 2,600+ code files for exact duplicates, near-duplicates, and redundant implementations
tasks.details: Use automated tools to identify duplicate files, similar code blocks, and redundant implementations across the entire codebase

tasks.title: Dead Code Elimination Analysis
tasks.description: Identify and catalog unused components, hooks, services, and utility functions
tasks.details: Comprehensive analysis to find unused exports, unreferenced functions, and dead code paths

tasks.title: Import Dependency Mapping
tasks.description: Create complete dependency graph and identify circular references
tasks.details: Map all import relationships and identify problematic circular dependencies

tasks.title: Component Complexity Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze component size, complexity, and identify refactoring candidates
tasks.details: Identify large components (>300 lines), complex components, and candidates for splitting

tasks.title: TypeScript Coverage Assessment
tasks.description: Analyze TypeScript usage and identify areas needing better typing
tasks.details: Review TypeScript coverage, identify 'any' types, and missing type definitions

tasks.title: SQL Migration Conflict Analysis
tasks.description: Review 390+ migration files for conflicts and redundancies
tasks.details: Analyze all migration files for conflicts, duplicate operations, and schema inconsistencies

tasks.title: Database Performance Query Analysis
tasks.description: Identify slow queries and missing indexes
tasks.details: Analyze query performance, identify missing indexes, and optimization opportunities

tasks.title: Schema Relationship Validation
tasks.description: Validate all foreign key relationships and data integrity
tasks.details: Check all table relationships, foreign key constraints, and referential integrity

tasks.title: Documentation Accuracy Audit
tasks.description: Review 800+ documentation files for accuracy and currency
tasks.details: Comprehensive review of all documentation for accuracy, completeness, and relevance

tasks.title: API Documentation Generation
tasks.description: Generate comprehensive API documentation from code analysis
tasks.details: Auto-generate API docs from TypeScript interfaces and service layer analysis

tasks.description: Update system architecture diagrams and technical specifications

tasks.title: Bundle Size Analysis & Optimization
tasks.description: Analyze webpack bundles and identify optimization opportunities
tasks.details: Comprehensive bundle analysis with recommendations for size reduction

tasks.title: Memory Leak Detection

tasks.description: Analyze production setup and identify optimization opportunities
tasks.details: Complete audit of production infrastructure, monitoring, and deployment processes
